```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(metathis)

meta() %>%
  meta_description(
    'Showcase for Fall 2022 semester of "EMSE 6035: Marketing Analytics for Design Decisions" at GWU'
  ) %>%
  meta_name("github-repo" = "emse-madd-gwu/2022-Fall") %>%
  meta_viewport() %>%
  meta_social(
    title = "madd.seas.gwu.edu",
    url = "https://madd.seas.gwu.edu/2022-Fall",
    image = "https://madd.seas.gwu.edu/images/madd_hex_sticker.png",
    image_alt = "Hex sticker for class logo",
    og_type = "website",
    og_author = c("John Paul Helveston"),
    twitter_card_type = "summary",
    twitter_creator = "@JohnHelveston"
  )
```
